verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rejoice, ye pure in heart, Rejoice, give thanks, and sing; Your festal banner wave on high, The cross of Christ, your King.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Rejoice, rejoice, Rejoice, give thanks, and sing!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: With all the angel choirs, With all the saints on earth, Pour out the strains of joy and bliss, True rapture, noblest mirth!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Still lift your standard high, Still march in firm array; As warriors through the darkness toil Till dawns the golden day.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Yes, on through life's long path, Still chanting as ye go; From youth to age, by night and day, In gladness and in woe.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Then on, ye pure in heart, Rejoice, give thanks, and sing; Your festal banner wave on high, The cross of Christ your King. Amen.
